name: Zip-Zatt
description:
DISCLAIMER:

Due to limitation, at each change of level, the mouse does not mask automatically.
Workaround: re-click in the screen to hide

CONTROLS :

Move robot : WASD or ZQSD or ↑←↓→
Activate draw : Left Mouse Button
Draw : Mouse Axis
Erase draw : Right Mouse Button
Confirm : Left Mouse Button (after activate draw)
Desactivate the draw : Middle Mouse Button or E
Open Pause Menu : Escape

HOW TO PLAY : 

Goal: Light up all bulbs
Game over: If you not light up all bulbs in one draw

HOW TO ZIP-ZAP :

Your robot attract Zibolt when he finished the electric run
You can always move your robot after Zibolt is ongoing!

LEXIC :

Yellow Gauge = Power of electric draw. It's drained when you draw and refill when Zibolt joining his robot

CREDITS :

  • SpartG - Dev, Game Design, UI and 3D graphics
  • Music used: "8 Bit Emperors Club!" by HeatleyBros
  • Sounds effects provided by "Retro 8 Bit Sounds" from GameMaster Audio
